name: Deprevate EP
description:
Our debut EP

Tracklisting

1. Element of Truth
2. The Last Time
3. Your Paranoia
4. Open Your Eyes
5. Salvation

*Price includes P&P*

name: Deprevate Footwear
description: A brand new and exclusive range of Deprevate footwear! We will not be selling these on tour or at any gigs the only way to get them is through the website below! Please do not try to buy through this Bigcartel page, follow the website below, pick your design and size and order through SoleMusic. If your size is not available it is because they have sold out, normally they go upto a size 11 or 12. If this is the case please check back in a week or so. Click here for our Sole Music page If only they were actually a pound haha! Prices vary and go upto 29.99 GBP Keep those feet toasty with a rocking design, and help support unsigned metal!

name: FREE DOWNLOAD!! Our War - Demo
description: 1. Our War 2. Rest Of Your Life 3. Speechless The tracks can be downloaded for free via Our Reverbnation Page Obviously you dont need to pay the £1.....just had to put in a value greater than £0 so just click on the link and then download the tracks! Simples. Dont say we dont treat you!!

name: Donate to Deprevate
description:
As you may know, we are a self funded and self managed band, and while we don't expect or want any hand outs, even a small donation from our fans will help us that little bit more. We are determined to work hard for what we want to achieve but cannot do it without your support!

Plus its the only thing in our Big Cartel store that is actually one pound! Feel free to stick a few in your cart though.... :p

Our new EP will be out around March/April 2012
